articles.title: Elderly Palestinians determined to stay in Gaza despite terrible conditions
articles.summary: Features | Israel-Palestine conflict Elderly Palestinians determined to stay in Gaza despite terrible conditions Chronic displacement and trauma burden Gazaâ€™s elderly, but they cling to their homeland as an act of defiance. articles.title: Fed Chair Jerome Powell Just Gave Good News About the Economy -- and Bad News to
articles.summary: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell concluded the Fed's January meeting, as he always does, with a press conference to go over the Fed's recent actions and answer reporters' questions about the economy. The market keeps a close eye on these press conferences, looking for clues about future interest rate and balance-sheet moves by the Fed. articles.title: Current mortgage rates report for Feb . 5 , 2026
articles.summary: The average interest rate for a 30-year, fixed-rate conforming mortgage loan in the U.S. is 6.096%, according to data available from mortgage data company Optimal Blue. Thatâ€™s up less than a full basis point from the prior dayâ€™s report , and up approximately 5 basis points from a week ago.
